short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extansion will help you to see Artworks on Steam which normally not show up correctly and other stuff to modify your profile!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It is still in development!

Current functions:

-[Fix Images] Shows up Artworks that are normally not visable for you.
-[Center Infobox] Shows up a centerline in every showcase box on your profile edit page, so you can center your text easier.

Thanks for testing :D
